languages.text: "Поверьте, Ваша Светлость, ксеноугроза — вещь серьезная, но куда менее страшная, чем угроза Хаоса. Иремерисс могла грабить и убивать тысячи людей, но ей было далеко до Уралона Жестокого. К тому же, планы архонта были направлены не против нас, а против ее же сородичей. Она планировала устроить в Комморре масштабную дизъюнкцию, сгубив конкурентов и возвысив свой кабал".

"Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the threat of the alien pales in comparison to that posed by the Ruinous Powers. Yremeryss could plunder a thousand worlds, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. She was as great a danger to her own kin as she was to the Imperium. The disruption she caused among the Drukhari was only to our benefit. She intended to trigger a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."
languages.original_text: "Поверьте, Ваша Светлость, ксеноугроза — вещь серьезная, но куда менее страшная, чем угроза Хаоса. Иремерисс могла грабить и убивать тысячи людей, но ей было далеко до Уралона Жестокого. К тому же, планы архонта были направлены не против нас, а против ее же сородичей. Она планировала устроить в Комморре масштабную дизъюнкцию, сгубив конкурентов и возвысив свой кабал".

traits.locale_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the xeno-threat is a serious one, but much less dangerous than the Chaos threat. Yremeriss could rob and kill thousands of people, but she is far more tame than Uralon the Cruel. And besides, the Archon's plans were aimed not against us, but against her own kin. She was planning on organizing a massive Disjunction in Commorragh, getting rid of her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

"Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the xeno-threat is a serious one, but much less dangerous than the Chaos threat. Yremeriss could rob and kill thousands of people, but she is far more tame than Uralon the Cruel. And besides, the Archon's plans were aimed not against us, but against her own kin. She was planning on organizing a massive Disjunction in Commorragh, getting rid of her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

"Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the xeno-threat is a serious one, but far less dangerous than the Chaos threat. Yremeriss could rob and kill thousands of people, but she is far more tame than Uralon the Cruel. Besides, the Archon's plans weren't aimed against us, but against her own kindred. She was planning on organising a massive Disjunction in Commorragh, getting rid of her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

"Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the xeno-threat is a serious one, but far less dangerous than the Chaos threat. Yremeriss could rob and kill thousands of people, but she is far more tame than Uralon the Cruel. Besides, the Archon's plans weren't aimed against us, but against her own kindred. She was planning on organising a massive Disjunction in Commorragh, getting rid of her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

"Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the xenos threat is a serious one, but far less dangerous than that of Chaos. Yremeryss could pillage and kill thousands of humans, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. Besides, the Archon was plotting against her own kind, not us. She intended to cause a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

"Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the threat of the alien pales in comparison to that posed by the Ruinous Powers. Yremeryss could plunder a thousand worlds, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. She was as great a danger to her own kin as she was to the Imperium. The disruption she caused among the Drukhari was only to our benefit. She intended to trigger a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

languages.text: « Croyez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, les xénos font pâle figure à côté de la menace que constituent les Puissances de la Ruine. Même si Yremeryss est capable de piller des milliers de mondes, elle est loin d'être aussi redoutable qu'Uralon le Cruel. En fait, elle représentait un danger aussi bien pour l'Imperium que pour ses semblables. La perturbation qu'elle a causée parmi les Drukharis n'a fait que nous avantager. Elle comptait déclencher une puissante disjonction à Commorragh pour se débarrasser de ses rivaux et permettre l'ascension de sa propre Kabale. »
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the threat of the alien pales in comparison to that posed by the Ruinous Powers. Yremeryss could plunder a thousand worlds, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. She was as great a danger to her own kin as she was to the Imperium. The disruption she caused among the Drukhari was only to our benefit. She intended to trigger a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

traits.locale_text: « Croyez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, la menace xénos est sérieuse, mais bien moins dangereuse que celle du Chaos. Yremeryss pourrait voler et tuer des milliers de gens, mais elle est bien plus docile qu'Uralon le Cruel. Qui plus est, l'archonte ne complotait pas contre nous, mais contre sa propre race. Elle comptait causer une disjonction massive à Commorragh pour se débarrasser de ses rivaux et permettre l'ascension de sa propre Kabale. »

languages.text: «Créame, mi{mf|lord|lady}, la amenaza xenos es irrisoria en comparación con la que presentan los Poderes Ruinosos. Yremeryss podía saquear un millar de mundos, pero nunca sería equiparable a Uralon el Cruel. Suponía un peligro tan grande para los suyos como para el Imperium. El caos que sembró entre los Drukhari nos fue de gran ayuda. Pretendía provocar una gran disyunción en Commorragh para destruir a sus rivales y reforzar a su Kábala».
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the threat of the alien pales in comparison to that posed by the Ruinous Powers. Yremeryss could plunder a thousand worlds, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. She was as great a danger to her own kin as she was to the Imperium. The disruption she caused among the Drukhari was only to our benefit. She intended to trigger a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

traits.locale_text: «Créame, mi{mf|lord|lady}, la amenaza de los xenos es grave, pero mucho menos que la del Caos. Yremeriss podría robar y matar a miles de personas, pero no puede compararse con Uralon el Cruel. Además, los planes de la Arconte no nos tenían a nosotros como objetivo, sino a sus propios hermanos. Pretendía organizar una disyunción inmensa en Commorragh para librarse de sus rivales y reforzar a su propia Kábala».

languages.text: “相信我，大人，与毁灭之力的威胁相比，异形的威胁简直微不足道。或许伊芮梅莉斯确实会劫掠几千个世界，但和残暴者乌拉隆相比，她只能说是小巫见大巫。而且，伊芮梅莉斯的行动并非仅仅针对帝国，也同样在针对她自己的族人。她打算在科摩罗策划一场巨大的分裂活动，除掉她的竞争对手，让她的阴谋团在这场动荡中跻身上位。”
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the threat of the alien pales in comparison to that posed by the Ruinous Powers. Yremeryss could plunder a thousand worlds, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. She was as great a danger to her own kin as she was to the Imperium. The disruption she caused among the Drukhari was only to our benefit. She intended to trigger a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

traits.locale_text: “相信我，大人，或许异形的威胁确实很严重，但远远不如混沌的威胁来得可怕。或许伊芮梅莉斯确实会劫掠很多颗行星，杀害成千上万的人，但比起残暴者乌拉隆，只能说是小巫见大巫。而且，伊芮梅莉斯执政官的阴谋并非针对我们，而是针对她自己的族人。她当时打算在科摩罗策划一场巨大的分裂活动，除掉她的竞争对手，在这场动荡中跻身上位。”

languages.text: "Vertraut mir, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, die Gefahr der Xenos verblasst im Vergleich zur Gefahr der Mächte der Zerstörung. Yremeryss könnte eintausend Welten plündern, doch sie ist kein Uralon der Grausame. Sie war für ihr eigenes Volk eine ebenso große Gefahr wie für das Imperium. Die Unruhe, die sie unter den Drukhari verursacht hat, war nur zu unserem Vorteil. Sie wollte in Commorragh eine mächtige Disjunktion auslösen und dadurch ihre Rivalen zerstören und ihre eigene Kabale erheben."
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the threat of the alien pales in comparison to that posed by the Ruinous Powers. Yremeryss could plunder a thousand worlds, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. She was as great a danger to her own kin as she was to the Imperium. The disruption she caused among the Drukhari was only to our benefit. She intended to trigger a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

traits.locale_text: "Vertraut mir, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, die Bedrohung durch Xenos ist zwar ernst, aber sehr viel weniger gefährlich als die Bedrohung durch das Chaos. Yremeryss könnte Tausende berauben und töten, doch sie ist sehr viel zahmer als Uralon der Grausame. Zudem waren die Pläne der Archontin nicht gegen uns gerichtet, sondern gegen ihre eigene Sippe. Sie hatte vor, in Commorragh für eine gewaltige Disjunktion zu sorgen und dadurch ihre Rivalen zu beseitigen und den Status ihrer eigenen Kabale zu erhöhen."

languages.text: 「陛下、私を信じてほしい。異種族の脅威は深刻なものではあるが、禍つ神々よりも遥かに危険は少ない。イレメリスは何千もの惑星を略奪することができるが、残酷なウラロンに比べれば遥かにおとなしいものだ。彼女は自分の同胞にとっても帝国にとっても大きな脅威だった。彼女がデュカーリに引き起こした混乱は、私たちにとっては有益だった。彼女はコモラフで大規模な粛清を組織し、ライバルを排除して自分の陰謀団の地位を高めるつもりだったのだ」
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the threat of the alien pales in comparison to that posed by the Ruinous Powers. Yremeryss could plunder a thousand worlds, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. She was as great a danger to her own kin as she was to the Imperium. The disruption she caused among the Drukhari was only to our benefit. She intended to trigger a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私を信じてほしい。異種族の脅威は深刻なものではあるが、禍つ神々よりも遥かに危険は少ない。イレメリスは何千もの惑星を略奪することができるが、残酷なウラロンに比べれば遥かにおとなしいものだ。彼女は自分の同胞にとっても帝国にとっても大きな脅威だった。彼女がデュカーリに引き起こした混乱は、私たちにとっては有益だった。彼女はコモラフで大規模な粛清を組織し、ライバルを排除して自分の陰謀団の地位を高めるつもりだったのだ」

languages.text: "Güvenin bana {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, bilinmeyenin tehlikesi, Yıkıcı Güçler'in oluşturduğu tehlikeye kıyasla sönük kalıyor. Yremeryss, yüzlerce dünyayı yağmalayabilir ama istese de Zalim Uralon olamaz. İmparatorluk'a olduğu kadar kendi ırkına da büyük bir tehlike oluşturuyordu. Drukhariler arasında yarattığı karmaşa işimize yaradı. Commorragh'ta güçlü bir ayrışımı tetikleyerek rakiplerini yok edecek ve o sırada kendi Kabalını yükseltecekti."
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, the threat of the alien pales in comparison to that posed by the Ruinous Powers. Yremeryss could plunder a thousand worlds, but she is no Uralon the Cruel. She was as great a danger to her own kin as she was to the Imperium. The disruption she caused among the Drukhari was only to our benefit. She intended to trigger a powerful dysjunction in Commorragh, thereby destroying her rivals and elevating her own Kabal in the process."
